name: Mad Coast Rally
description:
Invite you to the world of this crazy rally !!

The goal of this game is to create, modify, and grow your own racing cars and win the rally. Challenge your final race in this crazy rally by developing your own racing car!

Game Features (in veeerrry eeaarrly Alpha now)

1. This racing game is not a racing game that directly controls driving. It is a game that progresses by gradually raising and modifying a racing car and simulating the result. If you like the growth and simulation of the protagonist, this game is highly recommended.

2. You can progressively develop your racing car by growing your car, retrofitting and upgrading your skills through the lobby of out games.
In addition, various parts of the car can be installed and replaced through the rewards obtained through the game. Feel the joy that your car is growing!

3. Your racing car can learn a variety of skills, and as you use your skills strategically in the game, you can contribute to raising your race rankings.

4. If you follow a funny and interesting storyline, your racing car will grow up nicely. It is not difficult. Challenge it!

See this Devlog! We're recruiting a story writer and artists interested in this dev journey. :)
